title: Rainy city driving, ego vehicle moving slowly, braking frequently
caption: A rainy day in the city, the ego vehicle is moving slowly and braking frequently.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 1.8 m/s). There are 22 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is moving slowly because of the rainy conditions, and it is braking frequently to avoid potential accidents. The large building on the corner may be a landmark or a point of interest, and the pedestrians are also adapting to the weather conditions by walking carefully on the sidewalk.
